Interface ICapeNumericPartitionGraph

 
IDL source    Global index
interface ICapeNumericPartitionGraph : ICapeNumericProcessGraph

Use this interface to describe a Partition Graph.
The Partition Graph is a Flowsheet. It contains only one partition.

  • File = ICapeNumericSMST.idl
  • Date = June 99
  • Project = CAPE-OPEN BE 3512
Author:
CAPE-OPEN Partners
See Also:
CAPE-OPEN Web Site , Jean-Pierre Belaud, Inherited operations from ICapeNumericProcessGraph

  • GetInitialProcessGraph

    Gets the initial ICapeNumericProcessGraph interface.

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

  • SetInitialProcessGraph

    Sets the initial ICapeNumericProcessGraph interface.
    You should not use this method. This method is used by the ICapeNumericPartitioning::CreateAndCompletePartitionGraph() method in order to store the ICapeNumericProcessGraph from which the ICapeNumericPartitionGraph was created.

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

  • GetInitialProcessGraph

      ICapeNumericProcessGraph GetInitialProcessGraph()
    raises(CapeUNKNOWN);

    Gets the initial ICapeNumericProcessGraph interface.

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

    Returns:
    The object reference of ICapeNumericProcessGraph from which the ICapeNumericPartitionGraph was created and completed thanks to the ICapeNumericPartitioning::CreateAndCompletePartitionGraph() method.
    Raises:
    CapeUNKNOWN
    See Also:
    ICapeNumericPartitioning , ICapeNumericPartitioning::CreateAndCompletePartitionGraph

  • SetInitialProcessGraph

      void SetInitialProcessGraph(in ICapeNumericProcessGraph parent)
    raises(CapeBAD_PARAM, CapeUNKNOWN);

    Sets the initial ICapeNumericProcessGraph interface.
    You should not use this method. This method is used by the ICapeNumericPartitioning::CreateAndCompletePartitionGraph() method in order to store the ICapeNumericProcessGraph from which the ICapeNumericPartitionGraph was created.

    Pre Conditions: None.

    Post Conditions: None.

    Parameters:
    parent: The object reference of the initial ICapeNumericProcessGraph.
    Raises:
    CapeBAD_PARAM, CapeUNKNOWN
    See Also:
    ICapeNumericPartitioning , ICapeNumericPartitioning::CreateAndCompletePartitionGraph
